titles.title: A bill to restore equal treatment of foreign military sales and direct commercial sales in nonrecurring cost recoupment.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12046-12047)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 9/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Arms Export Control Act to remove a requirement that letters of offer for the sale of defense articles or services include charges for administrative services, nonrecurring costs of research, development, and production of major defense equipment, and specified inventory losses.
